stripped_text: click: Place 1 power counter on Chatterjee University. click: Install a program from your grip, lowering the install cost by 1 for each power counter on Chatterjee University. Remove 1 hosted power counter.
text:
[click]: Place 1 power counter on Chatterjee University.
[click]: Install a program from your grip, lowering the install cost by 1 for each power counter on Chatterjee University. Remove 1 hosted power counter.
title: Chatterjee University
